jp_text: 母様 今日ね すごく強くて格好いい人に会ったんだよ
google_translated: Mother Today I was very strong and I met a good person

en_text: I wonder if he's alone as well?
jp_text: あの人も一人ぼっちなのかな
google_translated: I wonder if that person is alone

en_text: If he is, I wish he could live in the forest with me.
jp_text: だとしたら 森で僕と一緒に住んで欲しいな
google_translated: If so, I want to live with me in the forest

en_text: All right, let's go to the city!
jp_text: よし 町へ行こう 夏目に会いに行こう
google_translated: Let's go to see the summer season
